data.title: Mary Lee Wickliffe Nicholas Obituary 2005
data.meta_description: Mary Lee Wickliffe Nicholas, 79, of 4123 Mason Woods Lane, Owensboro, passed away on Wednesday, February 2, 2005 at her home. She was born in Jefferson Co., Ky. and was a member...
data.text:
Mary Lee Wickliffe Nicholas, 79, of 4123 Mason Woods Lane, Owensboro, passed away on Wednesday, February 2, 2005 at her home. She was born in Jefferson Co., Ky. and was a member of First Presbyterian Church. She had attended Christian College which is now known as Columbia College in Columbia, Mo. and later graduated from the University of Kentucky. She was a member of the Tri Delta Sorority in Lexington, Jr. League of Owensboro, the Hideaway Beach Club on Marco Island in Florida, and was an avid UK basketball fan. She was preceded in death by her husband, Nicholas Nicholas Nicholas on Dec. 3, 1999.

Surviving are two sons and their wives, Madison Lee & Pat Nicholas of Owensboro, and Nicholas S. & Cristyne Nicholas of New York, N. Y., and a daughter, Suzanne Nicholas of Brooklyn, N. Y., two grandchildren, Matt Lee Nicholas of Owensboro, and Laurie Teasley of DeLand, Fl., three great grandchildren, Lexi Nicholas, and Taylor & Will Teasley.

A memorial service will be held at 5:00 P.M. Saturday, February 5, at the Glenn Funeral Home Chapel. There will be no visitation, but friends are invited to come for the service.

Memorial contributions may be made to Hospice Assoc. of Owensboro, 723 Harvard Dr., Owensboro, Ky. 42301 or the Foundation For Health, Mitchell Memorial Cancer Center, P. O. Box 22505, Owensboro, Ky. 42304-2505.

Birthplace: Jefferson Co., Ky.Resided In: Owensboro KY USAVisitation: NoneService: February 05, 2005
